job_history.work_description: Utilize the tools of Six Sigma and Lean to improve processes across the facilities. Lead cross-functional teams in identifying root cause, developing, and implementing a solution. Manage employees assigned as project leaders for Continuous Improvement projects and events.

Assign work to Mechanics. Lead and guide activities of all assigned personnel, assuring all maintenance is completed in compliance with established company policies, procedures, and applicable FAA regulations.
Troubleshoot mechanical malfunctions of engines. Launch and recover aircrafts. Perform maintenance on time sensitive parts. Perform minor repairs on airframe and engine.
Create shelf displays for games and gaming systems. Provide shoppers with detailed information used in the decision making process. Ensure games, iPods, media and accessories are properly stocked.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience leading cross-functional teams and managing employees assigned as project leaders for Continuous Improvement projects and events, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has led teams in various roles, including as a Manager, A&P Mechanic / Aircraft Technician, and Aviation Technician, indicating strong proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Six Sigma
skills.explanation: Utilized the tools of Six Sigma to improve processes across facilities and has a Master's degree in Six Sigma, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Lean
skills.explanation: Used Lean to improve processes across facilities, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Aviation Maintenance
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience as an A&P Mechanic / Aircraft Technician and Aviation Technician, indicating strong proficiency in aviation maintenance.

skills.name: Team Management
skills.explanation: Has managed teams in various roles, including as a Manager, A&P Mechanic / Aircraft Technician, and Aviation Technician, showing strong proficiency in team management.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Troubleshooted mechanical malfunctions of engines and performed minor repairs on airframe and engine, showing a solid working proficiency in problem-solving.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Provided shoppers with detailed information used in the decision-making process as a Sales Associate, showing a solid working proficiency in communication.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Performed maintenance on time-sensitive parts and ensured games, iPods, media, and accessories were properly stocked, showing a solid working proficiency in time management.
